entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
